Posts.EditableText: So is there a special command for a Title Screen before the game starts. I see a spot for Cover Art and a description in the game setup. Is there something for that?
Posts.HTML: So is there a special command for a Title Screen before the game starts. I see a spot for Cover Art and a description in the game setup. Is there something for that?

Posts.EditableText: I think the cover art is just for the game's listing on the website. It's never displayed within the game as far as I can tell.
Posts.HTML: I think the cover art is just for the game's listing on the website. It's never displayed within the game as far as I can tell.
